casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Christopher Sayer (8213)

Borden, O’Connell and Norcott, Js.

Argued January 16 decision released January 25, 1990 Robert W. Smith, with whom, on the brief, was James R. Smith, for the appellant (defendant). Julia DiCocco Dewey, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John Connelly, state’s attorney, and EvaLenczewski, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by State v. Lloyd, 185 Conn. 199, 440 A.2d 867 (1981).

There is no error.
